variant.question: Which of the following lists all the subparts of Annex V to the EU regulation No. 965/2012 (EASA AIR OPS PART-SPA)?

options.text: General requirements, Performance-based navigation (PBN) operations, Operations with specified minimum navigation performance (MNPS), Operations in airspace with reduced vertical separation minima (RVSM), Low visibility operations (LVO), Extended range operations with two-engine aeroplanes (ETOPS), Transport of dangerous goods, Helicopter operations with night vision imaging systems, Helicopter hoist operations, Helicopter emergency medical service operations, Helicopter offshore operations.

General requirements, Performance-based navigation (PBN) operations, Operations with specified minimum navigation performance (MNPS), Operations in airspace with reduced vertical separation minima (RVSM), Extended range operations with two-engine aeroplanes (ETOPS), Transport of dangerous goods, Helicopter operations with night vision imaging systems, Helicopter hoist operations, Helicopter emergency medical service operations, Flight time limitations

General requirements, Operations with specified minimum navigation performance (MNPS), Operations in airspace with reduced vertical separation minima (RVSM), Low visibility operations (LVO), Extended range operations with two-engine aeroplanes (ETOPS), Transport of dangerous goods, Helicopter operations with night vision imaging systems, Helicopter hoist operations, Helicopter emergency medical service operations, Helicopter offshore operations.

General requirements, Performance-based navigation (PBN) operations, Operations with specified minimum navigation performance (MNPS), Operations in airspace with reduced vertical separation minima (RVSM), Low visibility operations (LVO), Extended range operations with two-engine aeroplanes (ETOPS), Transport of dangerous goods.

variant.question: The objective of Standardised European Rules of the Air (SERA) Regulation (EU) No 923/2012 is to establish the (1) _____ and operational provisions regarding services and procedures in air navigation. SERA shall apply to aircraft engaged in general air traffic, the Competent Authorities of (2) _____, aerodrome operators, and ground personnel engaged in aircraft operations.

options.text: (1) common rules of the air; (2) EU Member States, air navigation service providers
(1) common rules of the air; (2) ICAO Contracting States, search and rescue service providers
(1) rules of the air that shall apply within the EU; (2) EU Member States, military aviation authorities
(1) rules of the air that shall apply within the EU; (2) ICAO Contracting States, certification authorities

variant.question: Who does Commission Implementation Regulation 2017/373 apply to?
